Open 'https://example.com/register'
Submit a form with invalid data
Verify the 'Email' input field displays a red border '1px solid #DC3545' when an invalid email is entered
Check the error message 'Please enter a valid email address.' appears below the 'Email' field with text color #DC3545 and font size 12px
Ensure the 'Password' input field requires a minimum of 8 characters
Ensure the 'Password' input field displays an error if less than 8 characters
Confirm the 'Register' button remains disabled until all required fields are valid
Verify the form fields retain their invalid values after submission
Ensure the input field box-sizing is 'border-box'
Check the 'Submit' button has opacity 0.7 when disabled
Confirm the error messages have a role attribute of 'alert'
Verify the button has cursor 'not-allowed' when disabled
Open 'https://example.com/'
Verify the hero background image 'hero_background.jpg' is loaded, has background-size 'cover', and background-position 'center'
Check the main heading 'Welcome to our service' has font size 48px, font weight 700, and text color #FFFFFF
Ensure the subheading 'Discover amazing features' has font size 24px and line height 1.3
Confirm the 'Learn More' button has background #007BFF, padding 15px 30px, and border-radius 5px
Verify the 'Learn More' button has a transition on background color and box-shadow over 300ms
Ensure the text content is vertically and horizontally centered within the hero section, which has minimum height 600px
Check the hero section has aria-label 'Hero banner for homepage'
Confirm the overlay filter 'brightness(0.7)' is applied to the background image
Verify the call-to-action button is clickable and leads to 'https://example.com/about'
Open 'https://example.com/' for the first time
Verify the cookie consent banner is visible at the bottom of the viewport, has fixed position, and background #333333
Check its text content 'We use cookies to improve your experience.' with text color #FFFFFF and font size 14px
Ensure the 'Accept' button has background #28A745, text color #FFFFFF, and padding 8px 16px
Confirm the 'Decline' button has border 1px solid #6C757D and text color #6C757D
Verify the banner has z-index 1070 and minimum width 320px for mobile viewports
Ensure clicking 'Accept' hides the banner (display 'none') and sets a cookie
Check the 'Learn more' link points to 'https://example.com/privacy-policy#cookies'
Confirm the banner is hidden on subsequent visits
Verify the banner's offset-height is less than 100px
Open 'https://example.com/dashboard'
Hover over the 'Info' icon
Verify a tooltip is visible after 200ms delay, displaying 'More information about this metric'
Check the tooltip has background #333333, text color #FFFFFF, and border-radius 4px
Ensure its padding is 8px 12px
Confirm the tooltip's font size is 12px and line height 1.2
Verify the tooltip is positioned 10px below the 'Info' icon and is horizontally centered relative to it
Ensure the tooltip has z-index 1000 and opacity 1
Check that the tooltip disappears when the mouse leaves the 'Info' icon
Confirm the tooltip has maximum width 200px
Verify the cursor over the 'Info' icon is 'help'
Ensure the tooltip has box-shadow '0px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)'
Open 'https://example.com/articles'
Verify the pagination component is visible at the bottom, centered horizontally with text-align 'center'
Check that exactly 5 page numbers are displayed at once, with '1' being active
Ensure the active page number '1' has background #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, and border-radius 50% for a circular shape
Confirm inactive page numbers have text color #007BFF and background #FFFFFF
Verify the 'Previous' button is disabled on page 1, with opacity 0.6 and cursor 'not-allowed'
Ensure the 'Next' button is enabled and clickable, navigating to 'https://example.com/articles?page=2'
Check each pagination link has padding 8px 12px and display 'inline-block'
Confirm the component has row-gap 0 and column-gap 5px between page numbers
Verify the overall pagination container has margin-top 20px
Ensure the active page number has aria-current attribute set to 'page'
